title: Heider and Simmel misinterpreted
dc:creator: Benjamin
description:
I learnt of the 1944 experiment of Heider and Simmel in the Machine Intelligence workshop at NIPS 2016. The experiment involved showing subjects the video below, and asking them to describe what they saw. If you’ve watched the video, you’ll not be surprised to learn that most of the subjects anthropomorphised the geometric objects (i.e. …
